tool.name: demo2D00
tool.help:
**Description**
Demo2D00 synthesizes one 2D image with nuclear, cell shape, and vesicular channels from all vesicular object models (nucleoli, lysosomes, endosomes, and mitochondria) without convolution. This model was trained from the Murphy Lab 2D HeLa dataset, which is included in CellOrganizer.
-----
**Input**
User parameter options are as follows:
the seed for the pseudo-random number generator, and
the image compression algorithm (LZW or None)
-----
**Output**
One image as a TIFF (.tif) file.
-----
**Example**
Running Demo2D00 with the following parameters,
Seed for pseudo-random number generator 3
Image compression
LZW
will result in the following image:
the url to the image image height in pixels image width in pixels whatever title you want for the image
